hero.title: How can we help you?
hero.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about university admissions, pricing, and exam prep.

items.question: How do I book a counseling session?
items.answer: You can book a session directly through our platform by visiting the Counseling page. Simply choose a counselor, select a convenient time slot from their calendar, and confirm your booking.

items.question: What is the refund policy?
items.answer: We offer a full refund if you cancel at least 24 hours before your scheduled session. Cancellations made within 24 hours may be subject to a 50% fee. Please contact our support team for assistance with refunds.

items.question: Do you offer scholarship guidance?
items.answer: Yes! Our counselors specialize in finding financial aid and scholarship opportunities relevant to your chosen universities and degree programs.

items.question: Which universities do you cover?
items.answer: We cover admissions for universities in the US, UK, Canada, Australia, and select European countries. Our database includes over 5,000 institutions.

items.question: Can you help with essay writing?
items.answer: We provide comprehensive essay review and feedback services. While we do not write essays for you, our mentors help you structure your story and refine your voice.

items.question: Do you offer SAT/ACT coaching?
items.answer: Yes, we offer comprehensive coaching for SAT, ACT, GRE, GMAT, and IELTS/TOEFL. Our courses are designed by top scorers.

items.question: Are the classes online or offline?
items.answer: We offer both online live classes and offline sessions at select centers. You can choose the mode that suits you best.

items.question: Do you have a free trial?
items.answer: Yes, we offer a free initial consultation and a demo class for our exam prep courses.

items.question: What payment methods do you accept?
items.answer: We accept all major credit/debit cards, UPI, and net banking.

items.question: How can I contact support?
items.answer: You can reach our support team via email at support@RightPath Saarthi.com or call us at our helpline number.

items.question: What are your support hours?
items.answer: Our support team is available Mon-Sat from 9 AM to 8 PM IST.

cta.title: Still have questions?
cta.description: Can't find the answer you're looking for? Our team is here to help you with any specific inquiries.
